item.title: 对日本超长期债券收益率创历史新高的反应
item.description: 周二，日本最长期限国债收益率攀升至历史新高，此前，由于对该国财政健康状况的担忧加剧，一场糟糕的拍卖引发了债券市场的抛售。【原文：Japan's longest-dated government bond yields climbed to all-time highs on Tuesday, after a poor auction sparked a selloff in the bond market as worries about the country's fiscal health grow.】

item.title: 研究显示，美国关税抑制了全球出口商的情绪
item.description: 安联贸易周二公布的一项全球调查显示，美国新关税浪潮严重打击了出口商的情绪，42%的公司目前预计其出口收入将明显下降。【原文：The wave of new U.S. tariffs has severely dampened the mood among exporters and 42% of companies now expect their export revenues to decline markedly, according to a global survey by Allianz Trade published on Tuesday.】

item.title: 独家：消息人士称英特尔正在探索出售网络和边缘部门
item.description: 三位熟知内情的消息人士透露，英特尔已经考虑剥离网络和边缘业务，因为这家芯片制造商希望砍掉其新任首席执行官认为并不重要的部分。【原文：Intel has considered divesting its network and edge businesses as the chipmaker looks to shave off parts of the company its new chief executive does not see as crucial, three sources familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 普华永道调查显示，大多数美国高管希望至少撤换一名董事
item.description: 普华永道（PwC）和美国经济咨商局（The Conference Board）的最新研究显示，绝大多数美国高管希望至少更换一名公司董事会成员，而且越来越多的高管认为董事们正在干预管理层。【原文：The vast majority of senior U.S. executives want at least one member of their company's board to be replaced, and a fast-growing number feel that directors are muscling in on management, new research from PwC and The Conference Board shows.】

item.title: 市场担忧需求，日本超长期债券收益率飙升至创纪录水平
item.description: 周二，日本最长期限国债收益率飙升至历史新高，原因是 20 年期国债拍卖情况不佳，投资者对国债需求的担忧加剧。【原文：The longest-dated Japanese government bond yields soared to all-time highs on Tuesday, as investors' worries about demand for the debts flared following a poor auction of 20-year securities.】

item.title: 印度医疗保健人工智能初创公司 Qure.AI 首席执行官表示，目标是在两年内上市
item.description: Qure.AI 是一家为医疗保健公司提供人工智能工具的印度初创公司，其首席执行官告诉路透社，该公司的目标是在下一财年实现盈利，并在两年内首次公开募股（IPO）。【原文：Qure.AI, an India-based startup providing artificial intelligence tools to healthcare firms, is aiming to turn profitable in the next financial year and for an initial public offer (IPO) in two years, its CEO told Reuters.】

item.title: 交易日 应对美国评级下调
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 沃达丰称德国今年将恢复增长
item.description: 移动和宽带供应商沃达丰（Vodafone）周二表示，截至 3 月底的全年业绩达到预期，预计今年在其最大市场德国的业绩将恢复增长，从而推动现金流的增加。【原文：Mobile and broadband provider Vodafone said it expected to return to top-line growth in Germany, its largest market, this year, driving an increase in cash flow after it said it met expectations for the year to end-March on Tuesday.】

item.title: 研究称，2024 年对拉美初创企业的投资增长 26%，2025 年将再次增长
item.description: 本周二发表的一份研究报告显示，2024 年拉丁美洲初创企业筹集的资金比 2023 年增长了 26%，超过了增长 7% 的欧洲和缩水 34% 的东南亚。【原文：Capital raised for startups in Latin America grew 26% in 2024 from 2023, more than in Europe, which was up 7%, and Southeast Asia, which shrank 34%, according to a study published on Tuesday.】

item.title: 苹果供应商富士康将向印度分公司投资 15 亿美元
item.description: 苹果供应商富士康在提交的一份文件中表示，该公司将向其印度分公司投资 15 亿卢比，因为这家 iPhone 制造商正在将更多的生产转移出受关税影响的中国。【原文：Apple supplier Foxconn will invest 1.5 billion rupees in its India unit, the company said in a filing, as the iPhone maker shifts more manufacturing out of tariff-hit China.】

item.title: Starlink 在孟加拉国启动，促进可靠的互联网接入
item.description: 科技企业家埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）旗下 SpaceX 公司的卫星互联网服务 Starlink 周二在孟加拉国发射升空，这个南亚国家正加紧努力确保可靠、不间断的互联网接入。【原文：Tech entrepreneur Elon Musk’s SpaceX-owned satellite internet service Starlink launched in Bangladesh on Tuesday, as the South Asian nation steps up efforts to ensure reliable, uninterrupted access to the internet.】

item.title: 日经新闻》称，Seven & i Holdings 计划向伊藤忠出售 Seven Bank 的部分股权
item.description: 据《日经新闻》周二报道，日本 Seven & i 控股公司计划向伊藤忠商事出售 Seven Bank 的部分股份，预计最早将于 5 月 30 日宣布。【原文：Japan's Seven & i Holdings plans to sell a partial stake in Seven Bank to trading house Itochu , with an announcement expected as early as May 30, the Nikkei business reported on Tuesday.】

item.title: 日本本田将减少电动汽车的生产，专注于混合动力汽车
item.description: 本田汽车（Honda Motor）周二表示，鉴于需求放缓，该公司正在缩减对电动汽车的投资，并将专注于通过新车型抓住混合动力汽车日益增长的需求。【原文：Honda Motor said on Tuesday that it was scaling back its investment in electric vehicles given slowing demand and would be focusing on capturing growing demand for hybrids with new models.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行降息，澳元下滑，并对全球前景发出警告
item.description: 澳元周二下滑，此前该国央行如期降息，同时强调了全球贸易战带来的经济风险，支持了市场对未来进一步宽松政策的押注。【原文：The Australian dollar slipped on Tuesday after the country's central bank cut interest rates as expected while highlighting the economic risks from a global trade war, supporting market wagers for further easing ahead.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行将利率降至 3.85% 的两年低点
item.description: 澳大利亚央行周二将其主要现金利率下调了25个基点，至3.85%的两年低点，理由是全球前景黯淡和国内通胀降温，但央行仍对进一步宽松持谨慎态度。【原文：Australia's central bank on Tuesday cut its main cash rate by 25 basis points to a two-year low of 3.85% citing a darker global outlook and cooling inflation at home, though it also remained cautious on further easing.】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行将利率降至 3.85% 的两年低点
item.description: 澳大利亚央行周二将其主要现金利率下调了25个基点，至3.85%的两年低点，理由是全球前景黯淡和国内通胀降温，但央行仍对进一步宽松持谨慎态度。【原文：Australia's central bank on Tuesday cut its main cash rate by 25 basis points to a two-year low of 3.85% citing a darker global outlook and cooling inflation at home, though it also remained cautious on further easing.】

item.title: 早间竞价市场情绪低落，交易商寻求贸易协议
item.description: 安库尔-班纳吉（Ankur Banerjee）对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Ankur Banerjee】

item.title: 澳大利亚央行警告全球贸易战对经济构成重大下行风险
item.description: 路透社悉尼5月20日电）澳大利亚央行周二表示，由于全球贸易紧张局势的连带影响，通胀率将下降，失业率将上升，即使假设降息幅度达到市场预期也是如此。【原文：SYDNEY, May 20 (Reuters) - Australia's central bank on Tuesday said inflation would be lower and unemployment higher due to the cascading effects of global trade tensions, and that was even assuming interest rates were cut as deeply as markets expected.】

item.title: 联发科首席执行官称联发科将于 9 月在台积电生产 2nm 芯片
item.description: 联发科首席执行官 Rick Tsai 周二在台北举行的 Computex 论坛上表示，台湾芯片设计公司联发科计划于 2025 年 9 月在晶圆代工厂台积电生产出新的 2 纳米芯片。【原文：Taiwan's chip designer MediaTek plans to tape out its new 2 nanometer chip at foundry TSMC in September 2025, MediaTek's CEO Rick Tsai said on Tuesday at the Computex forum in Taipei.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 TechnologyOne 半年利润超预期，创历史新高
item.description: 澳大利亚企业软件供应商 TechnologyOne 周二公布的上半年盈利超过分析师预期，股价攀升至历史新高。【原文：Shares of Australian enterprise software provider TechnologyOne climbed to an all-time high on Tuesday, after it posted first-half earnings above analyst expectations.】

item.title: 贸易战硝烟弥漫，中国下调关键利率助力经济发展
item.description: 周二，中国自10月以来首次下调基准贷款利率，同时主要国有银行下调存款利率，中国政府正努力放松货币政策，以帮助经济免受中美贸易战的影响。【原文：China cut benchmark lending rates for the first time since October on Tuesday, while major state banks lowered deposit rates as authorities work to ease monetary policy to help buffer the economy from the impact of the Sino-U.S. trade war.】

item.title: 加藤说：日美谈判将以过去的外汇协议为基础
item.description: 日本财务大臣加藤胜信周二表示，他希望与美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特就汇率问题举行的任何双边会谈都能基于双方的共同观点，即货币过度波动是不可取的。【原文：Japanese Finance Minister Katsunobu Kato said on Tuesday he expects any bilateral meeting with U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on exchange rates to be based on their shared view that excessive currency volatility was undesirable.】

item.title: 小米开始量产自主研发的 Xring O1 芯片
item.description: 小米公司创始人雷军周二表示，公司已开始量产自主研发的 Xring O1 高级移动芯片。【原文：Xiaomi's founder Lei Jun said on Tuesday that the company has started mass production of its self-developed Xring O1 advanced mobile chip.】

item.title: 越南称第二轮贸易谈判已在华盛顿开始
item.description: 越南贸易部表示，与美国的第二轮贸易谈判已在华盛顿开始，这个东南亚国家希望避免受到 46%关税率的威胁。【原文：Vietnam's trade ministry said a second round of trade negotiations with the United States has started in Washington, with the Southeast Asian country hoping to avoid a threatened 46% tariff rate.】

item.title: 台湾富士康称与英伟达合作的人工智能数据中心将拥有 100 兆瓦电力
item.description: 全球最大的合约电子制造商台湾富士康周二表示，该公司与英伟达（Nvidia）宣布合作建立的人工智能中心将分阶段建设，目标是拥有 100 兆瓦的功率。【原文：Taiwan's Foxconn , the world's largest contract electronics maker, said on Tuesday an artificial intelligence center it has announced with Nvidia will be built in phases and is targeted to have 100 megawatts of power.】

item.title: 贸易特使称日本坚持要求美国取消关税
item.description: 日本最高贸易谈判代表赤泽亮世周二表示，东京要求美国在双边贸易谈判中取消关税的立场没有改变。【原文：Japan's top trade negotiator, Ryosei Akazawa, said on Tuesday there was no change to Tokyo's stance of demanding an elimination of U.S. tariffs in bilateral trade negotiations.】

item.title: 交易员权衡美国债务和贸易协议，亚洲股市上涨
item.description: 周二亚洲股市上涨，而美国国债收益率则趋于稳定，这为美元提供了一点喘息空间，因为投资者正在评估世界最大经济体的债务负担，并等待贸易协议的达成。【原文：Asian stocks rose on Tuesday while U.S. Treasury yields steadied allowing a bit of a breathing room for the U.S. dollar as investors took stock of the debt load of the world's biggest economy and awaited trade deals.】

item.title: 耐克裁减技术部门部分职位
item.description: 体育用品零售商耐克公司的一位代表周一告诉路透社记者，该公司正在裁减技术部门的部分员工。【原文：Sportswear retailer Nike is laying off some of its employees in its technology division, a company representative told Reuters on Monday.】

item.title: 中国 CATL 在香港上市首日股价将大涨 12.5%
item.description: 中国电池巨头 CATL 在香港上市融资 46 亿美元，创下今年全球同类上市融资规模之最，该公司股价周二将上涨约 12.5%。【原文：Shares of China battery giant CATL are set to rise about 12.5% on Tuesday after the company raised $4.6 billion in its Hong Kong listing, the largest of its kind in the world this year.】

item.title: 税改投票前美元横盘，澳大利亚央行会议前澳元保持涨势
item.description: 由于美联储对经济持谨慎态度，以及美国立法者接近通过一项预计将扩大国家财政赤字的法案，美元在连续一周走低后于周二横盘整理。【原文：The dollar traded sideways on Tuesday after having glided lower for a week, hemmed in by the Fed's caution over the economy and as U.S. lawmakers came closer to passing a bill expected to widen the nation's fiscal deficit.】
